text: The men's 15 kilometre freestyle at the 2017 Asian Winter Games was held on 21 February 2017 at the Shirahatayama Open Stadium in Sapporo, Japan. ==Schedule== All times are Japan Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Tuesday, 21 February 2017 || 11:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== ;Legend *DNS — Did not start *DSQ — Disqualified {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athlete !width=80|Time |- | |align=left| |41:25.3 |- | |align=left| |41:29.8 |- | |align=left| |41:33.3 |- |4 |align=left| |41:49.1 |- |5 |align=left| |42:50.4 |- |6 |align=left| |43:10.5 |- |7 |align=left| |43:33.8 |- |8 |align=left| |43:35.5 |- |9 |align=left| |44:06.7 |- |10 |align=left| |44:24.5 |- |11 |align=left| |45:03.8 |- |12 |align=left| |45:17.1 |- |13 |align=left| |48:12.2 |- |14 |align=left| |48:29.3 |- |15 |align=left| |48:58.7 |- |16 |align=left| |50:17.6 |- |17 |align=left| |50:22.0 |- |18 |align=left| |51:24.2 |- |19 |align=left| |57:24.7 |- |20 |align=left| |58:26.1 |- |21 |align=left| |59:25.1 |- |22 |align=left| |1:00:58.6 |- |23 |align=left| |1:34:55.6 |- |24 |align=left| |1:42:48.9 |- |— |align=left| |DSQ |- |— |align=left| |DNS |} ==References== ==External links== *Results at FIS website Men 15
title: Cross-country skiing at the 2017 Asian Winter Games – Men's 15 kilometre freestyle
